meta_title: What is Inventory Turnover? MRO Benchmarks for 2026
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces back to poor MRO management. Master inventory turnover to optimize spare parts and reduce carrying costs with Factory AI.
title: What is Inventory Turnover? The Definitive Guide to MRO Inventory Metrics in 2026

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is Inventory Turnover? The Definitive Guide to MRO Inventory Metrics in 2026

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic wide shot of a modern industrial warehouse and maintenance storeroom. In the foreground, a diverse group of three maintenance professionals (one man, two women) are standing near a high-tech shelving unit. They are wearing clean, appropriate PPE including white hard hats, clear safety glasses, and high-visibility yellow vests over work shirts. One technician is holding a rugged industrial tablet, but only the back of the device is visible to the camera. The background shows organized rows of spare parts, motors, and gearboxes on industrial racking, with a clean polished concrete floor. The lighting is bright and industrial, conveying a sense of efficiency and high-tech organization. No text or screens are visible. Full body shots of the professionals.
